```{r}
#| include: false
library(data.table)
library(purrr)
library(vars)
library(svars)
require(fevdid)
require(ggplot2)
library(vfciBCHelpers)
```

```{r, echo = F, warning = F}
lags <- 2

data <- get_var_data(
  vfci = NULL,
  end_date = "2022-07-01",
  make_stationary = TRUE
)

x <- data |> copy()
v <- fit_var(x, lags = lags)

hetreg_list <- purrr::map(1:30, ~ fit_het_reg_from_var(v, hetreg_horizon = .x))

var_means <-
  purrr::map(1:30, ~{
    forecast(v, horizon = .x) |>
      as.data.table() |> 
      _[, t := .I - .x - lags] |>
      _[, horizon := .x] |>
      tidyfast::dt_pivot_longer(-c(t, horizon), names_to = "variable", values_to = "mean_fitted")
  }) |>
  purrr::list_rbind() |>
  _[, cum_mean_fitted := cumsum(mean_fitted), by = .(t, variable)] 

hetreg_dt <- purrr::map(1:30, ~ {dt <- hetreg_list[[.x]]$dt; dt$horizon = .x; dt}) |>
  purrr::list_rbind()

data <- 
  hetreg_dt |> 
  merge(var_means, by = c("t", "horizon", "variable"))

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| fig-height: 8
#| out-width: 100%
#| fig-cap: "Corelations and R-squared by horizon"

data[, .(
  corr = cor(cum_mean_fitted, log_var_fitted, use = 'complete.obs'),
  r_sq = cor(cum_mean_fitted, log_var_fitted, use = 'complete.obs') ^ 2
  ), by = .(variable, horizon)
] |>
  ggplot(aes(
    x = horizon,
    y = corr
  )) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) + 
  geom_line(aes(color = "corr")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = r_sq, color = "r_sq"), linetype = 2) +
  facet_wrap(vars(variable)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-1, 1)) + 
  theme_bw(base_size = 8)

```



```{r}
#| output: asis
#| echo: false

res <- map_chr(1:30, \(h) {
  knitr::knit_child(text = c(
    "## Horizon: `r h`",
    "```{r, echo = F, warning = F, fig.height = 6, out.width = '100%'}",
    "data[horizon == h] |>
    _[!is.na(log_var_fitted)] |>
    _[!is.na(cum_mean_fitted)] |>
    ggplot(aes(y = cum_mean_fitted, x = log_var_fitted)) +
    geom_point() +
    facet_wrap(vars(variable), scales = 'free', nrow = 4) +
    theme_bw(base_size = 8)",
    "```",
    ""), envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE)
})
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
